title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 2288 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Veterans	

Issued on:
August 23, 2017
On Wednesday, August 23, 2017, the President signed into law:H.R. 2288, the “Veterans Appeals Improvement and Modernization Act of 2017,” which provides comprehensive reform of the Department of Veterans Affairs benefits claims appeals process.
